locations.Dodongos Cavern MQ Compass Chest: (is_adult or can_child_attack or Nuts) and here(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)
locations.Dodongos Cavern MQ Larvae Room Chest: (can_use(Sticks) and here(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)) or has_fire_source
locations.Dodongos Cavern MQ Torch Puzzle Room Che:
can_blast_or_smash or can_use(Dins_Fire) or 
                ((is_adult and (logic_dc_jump or Hover_Boots or Progressive_Hookshot)) or can_use(Sticks) and
                here(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade))
locations.Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Song of Time Block: can_play(Song_of_Time) and (can_child_attack or is_adult) and here(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)
locations.Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Larvae Room: (can_use(Sticks) and here(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)) or has_fire_source
locations.Gossip Stone Fairy: can_summon_gossip_fairy and has_bottle and here(can_blast_or_smash or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)

exits.Dodongos Cavern Lower Right Side:
here(can_blast_or_smash or
                      ((can_use(Sticks) or can_use(Dins_Fire)) and can_take_damage and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade))
exits.Dodongos Cavern Bomb Bag Area:
can_blast_or_smash or (here(is_adult) and has_explosives) or
                (logic_dc_mq_child_bombs and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks) and can_take_damage and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)
exits.Dodongos Cavern Boss Area:
dodongos_cavern_shortcuts or
                has_explosives or
                (logic_dc_mq_eyes and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and
                    (is_adult or logic_dc_mq_child_back) and
                    (here(can_use(Sticks)) or can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                        (is_adult and (logic_dc_jump or Megaton_Hammer or Hover_Boots or Hookshot))))

exits.Dodongos Cavern Bomb Bag Area:
(here(can_use(Bow)) or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or
                 can_use(Dins_Fire) or has_explosives) and
                can_use(Slingshot)

locations.Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Scrub Room:
(here(can_use(Bow)) or Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or
                 can_use(Dins_Fire) or has_explosives) and
                (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Boomerang))

locations.Dodongos Cavern MQ Under Grave Chest: is_adult or has_explosives or (logic_dc_mq_child_back and (Sticks or can_use(Dins_Fire)))
locations.Dodongos Cavern Boss Room Chest: is_adult or has_explosives or (logic_dc_mq_child_back and (Sticks or can_use(Dins_Fire)))
locations.Dodongos Cavern King Dodongo Heart:
(dodongos_cavern_shortcuts or can_blast_or_smash) and 
                (Bombs or (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and
                (is_adult or (logic_dc_mq_child_back and (Sticks or can_use(Dins_Fire)))))) and 
                (is_adult or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
locations.King Dodongo:
(dodongos_cavern_shortcuts or can_blast_or_smash) and 
                (Bombs or (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and
                (is_adult or (logic_dc_mq_child_back and (Sticks or can_use(Dins_Fire)))))) and 
                (is_adult or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword)
